Title: Everything We Know About GPT-5 So Far
Description:
After a year of speculation and shifting narratives, GPT-5 appears to be nearing release—and it could be OpenAI’s most ambitious model yet. In this episode, NLW breaks down everything we know about GPT-5: how it integrates OpenAI’s reasoning and multimodal capabilities into a single, unified model; what rumors are swirling around features like longer context windows, memory, and mixture-of-experts architecture; and why this release may matter more for average users than hardcore AI insiders. Plus, what the rising pressure from Meta and OpenAI's internal challenges signal about the stakes of this next launch.
